testcase.classname: allow creating accounts and logging in
testcase.name: the admin account exists by default and can be logged in with the correct password

testcase.classname: allow creating accounts and logging in
testcase.name: the admin account can be signed out

testcase.classname: allow creating accounts and logging in
testcase.name: the admin account can not be logged in with incorrect password
an admin user can create and list movies
an admin user can update a movie
an admin user can delete a movie
an unauthenticated user can list movies

testcase.classname: allow creating, reading, updating and deleting rooms where the screenings will happen
testcase.name: an admin user can create and list rooms

testcase.classname: allow creating, reading, updating and deleting rooms where the screenings will happen
testcase.name: an admin user can update a room

testcase.classname: allow creating, reading, updating and deleting rooms where the screenings will happen
testcase.name: an admin user can delete a room

testcase.classname: allow creating, reading, updating and deleting rooms where the screenings will happen
testcase.name: an unauthenticated user can list rooms

testcase.classname: allows creating, deleting and listing screenings
testcase.name: The admin user can create and query screenings

testcase.classname: allows creating, deleting and listing screenings
testcase.name: The admin can not create overlapping screenings in the same room

testcase.classname: allows creating, deleting and listing screenings
testcase.name: The admin can create overlapping screenings in different rooms

testcase.classname: allows creating, deleting and listing screenings
testcase.name: The admin can not create screenings during a 10 minute long breaks after another screening in the same room

testcase.classname: allows creating, deleting and listing screenings
testcase.name: The admin can create screenings even if there is a break after a screening in a different room

testcase.classname: allows creating, deleting and listing screenings
testcase.name: The admin user can delete screenings
